Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product for $9500. This price reflects my commitment to making high-quality products accessible while ensuring fair compensation for my efforts and resources. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to hear from you soon. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
